item.title: R to @bat020: ... followed by "holy fuck how much is that worth how did they get hold of this", then I looked up and saw in the corner of the space The Rockefeller Room and thought "oh that's how".

item.title: R to @5ChinCrack: ah right I get you. this reminds me of my first visit to MoMA in NYC for circa 1995 and seeing Les Demoiselles d'Avignon and thinking "oh that's Les Demoiselles d'Avignon"... followed swiftly by "oh shit that's THE Les Demoiselles d'Avignon, the one Picasso actually painted"...
item.dc:creator: @bat020

item.title:
RT by @bat020: Those of us in public life should admit our mistakes. That's why I'm apologising to all BA workers for getting it wrong on Sunday.
BA must restore the pay of their loyal workforce - and the gvt must sit down with employers and workers to address chronic low pay in aviation.
item.dc:creator: @DavidLammy
item.description:
Those of us in public life should admit our mistakes. That's why I'm apologising to all BA workers for getting it wrong on Sunday.

BA must restore the pay of their loyal workforce - and the gvt must sit down with employers and workers to address chronic low pay in aviation.

item.title:
RT by @bat020: Reach Plc journalists are to be balloted on stirke action after rejecting 3% pay offer.
According to the NUJ, Its chief executive Jim Mullenâ€™s Â£4m pay package last year was worth 107x the pay of median earning Reach employees, and in stark contrast to the final 3% pay offer.
